it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.utils.localization.particlefilter

Class ParticleFilterStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.observer.AbstractEmitter<IndoorPosition>
      • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.AbstractIndoorLocalizationStrategy
        • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.utils.localization.particlefilter.ParticleFilterStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndoorLocalizationStrategy, Emitter<IndoorPosition>, Observer<PDR.Result>

    public class ParticleFilterStrategy
extends AbstractIndoorLocalizationStrategy
implements Observer<PDR.Result>
    A localization strategy that uses the Particle Filter.

      • updateAndFilter

        private void updateAndFilter(java.util.Collection<PositionParticle> particles)
        At every step, it is dAngle ~ N(0,PI/2) and dSpeed ~ N(0,(0.15)^2). Second step: filter invalid particles.

      • getMaxLimit

        public float getMaxLimit(java.util.List<PositionDistance<XYPosition>> pds)
        When filtering by fingerprints, the particle dies when the random number between 0 and N is less than particle's interpolated distance. This function decides N.

        Returns:
